text: Isidro Fabela Alfaro (29 July 1882) was a Mexican politician. He was Governor of the State of Mexico from 1942 to 1945. He was militant of the Institutional Revolutionary Party. Isidro Fabela Alfaro was born in Atlacomulco, State of Mexico, Mexico. ==References== Category:1882 births Category:Governors of the State of Mexico Category:People from Mexico (state) Category:Writers from Mexico (state) Category:People from Atlacomulco
title: Isidro Fabela Alfaro
